subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Two nights after being benched, Knicks guard Steve Francis reclaimed his starting job and scored a team-high 22 points in a 101-77 rout of the Boston Celtics.
snippet: Two nights after being benched, Knicks guard Steve Francis reclaimed his starting job and scored a team-high 22 points in a 101-77 rout of the Boston Celtics.
